meanings.definition: To make the sign of the cross on or over someone in blessing.
meanings.sent1: She sained her child before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: During the ceremony, the priest will sain the newborn.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to sain the mouse before letting it go.
meanings.sent4: The artist sained the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The old tradition was to sain the entrance of the house for good luck.
